job.title: API and Web Application Development Consultant
job.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a highly knowledgeable and experienced consultant specializing in the domain of ACH (Automated Clearing House) Direct Deposit Merchant Services. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of the intricacies involved in bank linking within this domain. This position requires expertise in developing APIs and complete web applications tailored to the specific needs of ACH Direct Deposit Merchant Services.

Responsibilities:

Domain Expertise:

Demonstrate a profound understanding of ACH Direct Deposit Merchant Services, including comprehensive knowledge of industry standards and compliance requirements.
Bank Linking:

Execute strategies for seamless bank linking processes within the context of ACH transactions.
Develop and implement solutions to optimize and secure bank linking procedures.
API Development:

Design, develop, and maintain robust APIs tailored for ACH Direct Deposit Merchant Services.
Ensure APIs meet industry standards, security protocols, and compliance requirements.
Web Application Development:

Lead the development of end-to-end web applications catering to the unique needs of ACH Direct Deposit Merchant Services.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate front-end and back-end components.
Technology Assessment:

Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends related to ACH services.
Conduct assessments to recommend and implement technological advancements to enhance efficiency.
Compliance and Security:

Implement and enforce security measures to safeguard sensitive ACH data.
Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards.
Documentation:

Prepare comprehensive documentation for developed APIs, web applications, and related processes.
Provide training and support to internal teams as needed.
Collaboration:

Work closely with stakeholders, including clients, developers, and project managers, to understand requirements and deliver effective solutions.
Qualifications:

Bachelor's or higher degree in a relevant field.
Proven experience in ACH Direct Deposit Merchant Services with a focus on bank linking.
Strong expertise in API development and web application architecture.
Familiarity with security protocols and compliance standards in the financial services industry.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate in a team-oriented environment.
If you are a seasoned professional with a passion for ACH Direct Deposit Merchant Services and possess the technical prowess to develop cutting-edge solutions, we invite you to apply and contribute to our innovative and dynamic team.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for an experienced API and Web Application Development Consultant to join our team for a 1 to 3-month project. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in API development and integration, as well as expertise in the .NET Framework, AngularJS, ASP.NET, Node.js, and SQLite. 

As a consultant, your main responsibility will be to provide expert guidance and support in developing and implementing APIs and web applications. You will work closely with our team to understand our requirements and design solutions that meet our needs. 

To apply for this position, please submit a detailed proposal outlining your experience with API and web application development. Please include links to some of your past completed projects, demonstrating your skills and expertise in this area. We look forward to reviewing your proposals and finding the right candidate to help us successfully complete this project.
